code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./Jobs.css";import CategoriesNav from"../categoriesNav/categoriesNav";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Jobs=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("https://api.example.com/Jobs");if(!response.ok){throw new Error("Failed to fetch data");}const result=await response.json();setData(result);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Jobs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoriesNav,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"Jobs-title",children:"Available Jobs"}),loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"red"},children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Jobs-container",children:data.map(jobs=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Jobs-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:jobs.image,alt:jobs.name,className:"Jobs-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Jobs-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"Jobs-name",children:jobs.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Jobs-description",children:jobs.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"Jobs-price",children:["Price: ",jobs.price]})]})]},jobs.id))})]});};export default Jobs;
